title: House of the Clockwork Women
description: Three forces are fighting for world domination. Trapped in the crossfire is a rock band called Forbidden Fruitcake. All they want to do is make peace, make love, and make music. But the conflict rages out of control. It all culminates with a crowd of naked men set against a monstrous regiment of women inside a bawdyhouse full of exotic entertainments.
author: Adam Abels
